attributes.action: Waive Indefinite Leave to Remain fees for healthcare professionals
attributes.additional_details: Our healthcare heroes, including doctors and nurses, deserve recognition. We urge fee waivers to ease their financial burden. The upcoming 20% hike to £2,885 from £2,404 is a heavy burden amidst rising living costs, which affects some healthcare professionals on visas. These individuals play a crucial role in the NHS and our communities. We believe that supporting them financially is an investment in the future of our healthcare system and the well-being of our nation.
attributes.background: We petition for a waiver in Indefinite Leave to Remain (ILR) fees for healthcare professionals, acknowledging their immense dedication in safeguarding public health.
